query:
ALTER TABLE libraryMaterials 
ADD COLUMN approvalStatus ENUM('pending', 'approved', 'rejected') DEFAULT 'approved',
ADD COLUMN approvedBy INT,
ADD COLUMN approvedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
ADD COLUMN rejectionReason TEXT;
